lines.text:
[wearing a judge's wig]
You're a family man, Monahan, so I'm only going to sentence you to 45 years, at hard labor. One thing I cannot stand is a dishonorable police officer.

[as a bride]
Ohhhh, ju-u-u-udge? Will you marry me?

[groom's hat flies on top of Bugs' head]
Certainly, my darling sweety. I would be delighted to marry up with you.
[last lines]
You know, I think it always helps a picture to have a romantic ending.
[first lines]

It is a well-known psychological fact that people's behavior is strongly affected by the way they dress. For instance, if we alter this gentleman's attire to something more romantic, certain changes in attitude may perhaps be detected.
[the man's business suit is changed to a pirate outfit]
Batten down the keelhaul! Yahoo! Kill the women and children first! Blood! Gore! Spit 'em on the tatters!
Even a change of hats will usually bring certain changes.
[Elmer Fudd appears on screen]
Look at this mild-mannered little man. A rather quaint figure, we might say, in his old-fashioned clothes. Yet put a hunter's cap on his head and let's see what happens.
Bang, bang, bang! Come out of your holes, you cowardwy wabbits! Bang, bang! And I'll bwow you to smitteweenies!

[wearing a General McArthur hat]
I have weturned!
Yipes! I've been outweighted!

[to Elmer, wearing a gangster's hat, smoking a cigar]
I told ya, Marooni, this was my territory. Told ya to keep out, so...
I'm gonna rub ya out, Marooni, see? Yeah, rub ya... out, see? Yeah. See? Out. See? Out.
[a police cap falls on Elmer's head]
See?
All wight, Wocky, you're comin' with me, you mawefactor!
Hey, look, copper, we can settle this outta court. Yeah, moolah, yeah.
[he hands Elmer a wad of cash]
Ten G's, yeah. Buy somethin' for the kids, yeah.
How dare you twy to bwibe me, you miscweant!

[as a Thanksgiving hunter]
I'm just shooting turkeys for the Thanksgiving dinner.

[as a Indian chief]
Ug.
[grabs Elmer's gun and begins to shoot him]
Yah-ahboahboahboahboboo!

[as an army sergeant]
Forwa-a-a-a-rd... march.
Come on out now, and let me see the cowor of your spurting bwood!
My spurting blood? Yipe!
Okay, buster, what's the idea of shooting sergeants out of season?
